mapper.sql: DeliveryNo, ManualNo,OilNo, Shift, DischargeLoss, DischargeRate, PlanL, RealReceiveL, HeightEmpey, HeightTotal, HeightWater, CubageTable, PlumbunBankOperator, CalculateOperator, BackBankNo, CanTruckTemp, IsFullDose, ServiceLevel, CreateTime, IsDel, RealGetL, DuringSales, TranStatus,DischargeLossV20,DischargeRateV20,RealGetLV20,BeginTime,EndTime,InStationTime,IndemnityLoss
mapper.select: SELECT oilno ,SUM(RealGetLV20) AS RealGetLV20 FROM oss_acceptance_odRegister WHERE shift >=#{minshift} AND shift <= #{maxshift} GROUP BY oilno

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(EndOilL),0)-IFNULL(SUM(BeginoilL),0)+IFNULL(SUM(DuringSales),0) AS Dischargel, IFNULL(SUM(DischargeL),0) AS V20, IFNULL(SUM(DuringSales),0) AS DuringSales, #{yfssv20,jdbcType=DOUBLE} - IFNULL(SUM(DischargeL),0) AS v20loss, (#{yfssv20,jdbcType=DOUBLE} - SUM(DischargeL)) / #{yfssv20,jdbcType=DOUBLE} AS V20lossrate, #{yfss,jdbcType=DOUBLE} - (IFNULL(sum(EndOilL),0)-IFNULL(sum(BeginoilL),0)+IFNULL(sum(DuringSales),0)) AS loss, (#{yfss,jdbcType=DOUBLE} - (IFNULL(sum(EndOilL),0)-IFNULL(sum(BeginoilL),0)+IFNULL(sum(DuringSales),0))) / #{yfss,jdbcType=DOUBLE} AS lossreate, #{yfssv20,jdbcType=DOUBLE}-IFNULL(SUM(Dischargel),0)-(#{yfssv20,jdbcType=DOUBLE} * #{syl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}) AS shsp
FROM oss_acceptance_odRegisterInfo WHERE ManualNo = #{billno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or DeliveryNo=#{billno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from oss_acceptance_odRegister where ManualNo = #{manualNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or DeliveryNo=#{manualNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into oss_acceptance_odRegister (DeliveryNo, ManualNo,OilNo, Shift, DischargeLoss, DischargeRate, PlanL, RealReceiveL, HeightEmpey, HeightTotal, HeightWater, CubageTable, PlumbunBankOperator, CalculateOperator, BackBankNo, CanTruckTemp, IsFullDose, ServiceLevel, CreateTime, IsDel, RealGetL, DuringSales, DischargeLossV20,DischargeRateV20,RealGetLV20, TranStatus,BeginTime,EndTime,InStationTime,IndemnityLoss) values (#{deliveryno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{manualNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dischargeloss,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dischargerate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{planl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{realreceivel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{heightempey,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{heighttotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{heightwater,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cubagetable,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{plumbunbankoperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calculateoperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backbankno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cantrucktemp,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{isfulldose,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{servicelevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realgetl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{duringsales,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{realGetLV20,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{dischargeLossV20,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{dischargeRateV20,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{instationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{indemnityloss,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

SELECT
FROM oss_acceptance_odRegister WHERE ( DeliveryNo IS NULL OR DeliveryNo = '') AND OilNo =#{0,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ManualNo IN(SELECT DeliveryNo FROM oss_acceptance_nobills where IsComplete=1 )
